title: Talking Horses: Saturday's best bets plus the latest racing news
text: Salman Khan INSULTS Sonu Nigam 01:54 Recently it came to light that Salman Khan and his best buddy from the industry Aamir Khan had a major spat at a party. And looks like Salman and his Hangover singer, Sonu Nigam too had a tiff at a recently concluded event.
